short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage prompts with customizable variables for seamless copying and pasting, enhancing your workflow as a creator.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PromptBugBie is your ultimate tool for managing and customizing reusable prompts. Whether you're a writer, marketer, developer, or content creator, this extension streamlines your workflow by allowing you to:

- Save Prompts: Easily store your most-used prompts in an organized list for quick access.
- Edit and Customize: Modify prompts on the fly and tailor them with variables.
- Insert Variables: Define and replace dynamic variables in your prompts for personalized results.
- Copy with Ease: One-click copying for instant use in your projects.

Designed for efficiency and flexibility, PromptBugBie helps you stay focused and productive by eliminating repetitive tasks. Ideal for anyone who frequently works with structured text or templates.
